00001 #!/usr/bin/env python
00002 
00003 import os
00004 
00005 if (__name__ == '__main__'):
00006     for fileName in os.listdir("."):
00007         if (fileName[0].islower() == True):
00008             firstChar = fileName[0].upper()
00009             newFileName = "FileType" + firstChar + fileName[1:]
00010             os.rename(fileName, newFileName)
00011             print newFileName
00012         else:
00013             print fileName
